welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Agustin Loxicha, where the mountains meet the sea and the charm of Mexico comes to life. Get ready to immerse yourself in our rich culture, breathtaking landscapes, and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay and explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Huatulco Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Huatulco Airport handles flights within Mexico.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Huatulco Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
